<tools>

   - Tool: compare_offers

     Compare up to three job offers.

     Parameters
     ----------
     base_usd : list[int]
         Annual base salaries.
     bonus_pct : list[int]
         Target bonus percentages.

                 {"total_comp": <int>, "rank": <int>}, …
